content:
Hi, I'm David, a long time developer with mostly C, C++ and python. I started learning rust about 2 years from now and hope to use it professionally in a near future.
Rust is not yet my goto language for all my projects/scripts but I'm working on it.

I'm here to get in touch with clippy devs as my interest is on it these days. I've just joined the clippy channel and will post there.

dvermd said:

I'm here to get in touch with clippy devs as my interest is on it these days. I've just joined the clippy channel and will post there.

What is clippy?
It's a large collection of lints that aren't included in the main compiler: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy
